description:
This episode I show you how to easily make some disgusting looking pits full of disolving body parts and blood. This build was created using only materials from the dollar store and is quick to do.

Support the channel on Patreon: http://patreon.com/blackmagiccraft

Join us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Black-Magic-Craft-677344725740094/?ref=bookmarks

title: Bloody Body Parts Disolving Pit for D&D Tutorial (Black Magic Craft Episode 018)
